description:
Five prominent Senate Democrats have sent a letter to OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, seeking clarity on the company’s safety and employment practices. The letter – signed by Senators Brian Schatz, Ben Ray Luján, Peter Welch, Mark R. Warner, and Angus S. King, Jr. – comes in response to recent reports questioning OpenAI’s commitment to its... Read more »

The post Senators probe OpenAI on safety and employment practices appeared first on AI News.
title: Senators probe OpenAI on safety and employment practices

description:
A study conducted by OpenResearch has shed light on the transformative potential of universal basic income (UBI). The research aimed to “learn from participants’ experiences and better understand both the potential and the limitations of unconditional cash transfers.” The study – which provided participants with an extra $1,000 per month – revealed significant impacts across... Read more »

The post OpenResearch reveals potential impacts of universal basic income appeared first on AI News.
title: OpenResearch reveals potential impacts of universal basic income
